context: I love the book A Grief Observed. Can you recommend any other books similar?
Sure! A Grief Observed was written by C.S. Lewis. Lewis also wrote Till We Have Faces
Oh I love the writings of CS Lewis! I read the Chronicles of Narnia. What other books did he write?
He also wrote The Silver Chair and The Great Divorce. Have you read either of these?
No I have not. What can you tell me about The Silver Chair?
resp: The Silver Chair is a Fantasy and Children's Literature book
